scenario_text.value:
What was this place? It originally comes from
our world, doesn’t it?

Yeah, I think it’s an underground waterway
from a big city or something?
They have mazes like this under cities?

Yeah. Big cities apparently have wide
underground networks.

Wooow, we’ve been walking on top of these the
whole time...

They’re not usually quite so intricate,
though. There should be plenty of exits...

True. I don’t see any manholes anywhere,
either.

Did something strange occur when it appeared
in this world? Or are these paths just old?

It’s humid and super nasty in here.
Let’s find everyone and get the heck out!
